title: The Elder Scrolls V Skyrim Legendary Edition Multi5
description:
Title: The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim Legendary Edition
Genre: RPG / fantasy / open world
Released: 4th June 2013
Developer: Bethesda Game Studios
Publisher: Bethesda Softworks
Languages: English, French, German, Italian, Spanish
System requirements: Windows 7/Vista/XP, quad-core Intel or AMD CPU, 4GB RAM, 6GB free HDD space, DirectX 9.0c compatible NVIDIA or AMD ATI video card with 1GB of RAM, DirectX compatible sound card
Description:
Winner of more than 200 Game of the Year awards, experience the complete Skyrim collection with The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim Legendary Edition. The Legendary Edition includes the original critically-acclaimed game, official add-ons Ã¢â‚¬â€œ Dawnguard, Hearthfire, and Dragonborn Ã¢â‚¬â€œ and added features like combat cameras, mounted combat, Legendary difficulty mode for hardcore players, and Legendary skills Ã¢â‚¬â€œ enabling you to master every perk and level up your skills infinitely.

How to play:
1) Extract the main game files from the archive in the Game folder to a folder on your PC;
2) Extract the language files from the appropriate archive in the Languages folder to the same folder on your PC;
3) Extract the cracked executables from the appropriate archive in the Cracks folder to the same folder on your PC;
4) Install DirectX 10, .NET Framework 3.5 and Visual C++ 2010 Redistributable from the Redist folder if needed;
5) Start the game using SkyrimLauncher.exe or TESV.exe located where you copied the game files.

! Notice
When running the game for the first time, you should use SkyrimLauncher.exe, which will detect your system configuration and set the game options accordingly.

! Notice
If you open SkyrimLauncher.exe and it shows an Install button instead of a Play button, it means that the game can't find a registry key on your PC. Click the Install button, the registry key should be created and then the Play button should appear (you'll only have to do this once).

! Notice
To activate or deactivate mods, you must use SkyrimLauncher.exe before starting the game.

! Notice
The official high resolution texture pack is included.

If you like the game, BUY it!

www.elderscrolls.com
